EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire.Con
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, January 13, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ef196d81136a5508e4997057df9fa1c7f>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 668 463 005
Thank you,
